scripts.setup-circuit: cd circuit && npm install && bash setup.sh
scripts.build-contract: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && mkdir -p artifacts && cp target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/juno_privacy_mixer.wasm artifacts/
scripts.setup-relayer: cd relayer && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run setup-circuit && npm run build-contract && npm run optimize-contract && npm run deploy-contract
